comments: Freedoom is the best DOOM clone, that is available on Android (and possibly iOS)! I absolutely adore this game! Odd controls, however, you may configure your controls, and place the buttons where ever you feel comfortable placing your fingers.  This game has so much originality being a DOOM clone. Cool weapons, mysterious locations, bad@$$ enemies, and amazing music!  Definetly give this game a try!  Freedoom: 8.5/10 EXO 4/5 EXO  Love it!

I find Freedoom to be one of the best doom clones to play, and it even comes with a sequel! What's also great is that you can use other WAD files to play more levels or custom doom stuff like brutal doom and even the original doom! The controls are simple and feel great as well. One of the best and underrated DOOM apps of all time in the play store

I've been waiting a long time for a game like this. It delivers very well. Had to turn down the sensitivity for mobile play, but I'm sure I'll get used to it. I love how there are options to make it more like the original game. Very well done, guys.

Controls makes it unplayable. I'm not going to give this game any stars since I can't play it. On a side note why does this game has access to network and write to storage permissions? Please explain.
Have to get used to it if ur not an old-school gamer. Never really played doom but I still got into it.

Works amazingly well and the controls are not terrible once you get used to them. Needs keyboard if you want to use dual weapons with mods like brutal doom. But that being said, mods work, original wads work, all in all it's probably the best doom source port on android! Well done!
description: Why Freedoom?While the game engine for everyone's favorite game from 1993 and its many spinoffs are open-sourced, most of its "assets" such as textures, sounds, and game levels are copyrighted and not legal to redistribute. The Freedoom project offers an alternative set of assets and game levels that are entirely original, open source, and can be used with most engines of said 1993 game. In addition, Freedoom is compatible with most of the vast library of fan-made "WADs" (i.e. game levels) as indexed in the idgames archive.This app is a fork of nvllsvm's GZDoom-Android port. My idea for this fork was to bundle this app with the open source Freedoom (freedoom1.wad and freedoom2.wad) assets to publish a completely open source android game running on the GZDoom engine. I hope this "bundling" will allow it to reach a more diverse audience of users whom either don't own the OG awesome 1993 game or are averse to having to find and copy their legally-owned game resource files onto their phones.Most custom wads can be played by:1.  placing them under Freedoom/config/wads2. Selecting the desired wad from the main screen by pressing "Addons", "WADS", then your desired wad3. hit "OK", then select the main game resource file to use (usually freedoom2.wad)4. hit "Launch"5. start a "new game" as usual, but you will go to custom level instead of the normal first level of the game6. (alternate) some levels replace other maps than the first one in the game and may require use of a warp command or special launch argument to get to itFull game mods should be placed in Freedoom/config/modsDISCLAIMERThis project is not affiliated with Id Software or parent companies, Bethesda, or any relevant publishing companies.More info:https://github.com/mkrupczak3/GZDoom-Androidhttps://freedoom.github.io/index.html
descriptionHTML:
Why Freedoom?

While the game engine for everyone's favorite game from 1993 and its many spinoffs are open-sourced, most of its "assets" such as textures, sounds, and game levels are copyrighted and not legal to redistribute. The Freedoom project offers an alternative set of assets and game levels that are entirely original, open source, and can be used with most engines of said 1993 game. In addition, Freedoom is compatible with most of the vast library of fan-made "WADs" (i.e. game levels) as indexed in the idgames archive.

This app is a fork of nvllsvm's GZDoom-Android port. My idea for this fork was to bundle this app with the open source Freedoom (freedoom1.wad and freedoom2.wad) assets to publish a completely open source android game running on the GZDoom engine. I hope this "bundling" will allow it to reach a more diverse audience of users whom either don't own the OG awesome 1993 game or are averse to having to find and copy their legally-owned game resource files onto their phones.

Most custom wads can be played by:
1. placing them under Freedoom/config/wads
2. Selecting the desired wad from the main screen by pressing "Addons", "WADS", then your desired wad
3. hit "OK", then select the main game resource file to use (usually freedoom2.wad)
4. hit "Launch"
5. start a "new game" as usual, but you will go to custom level instead of the normal first level of the game
6. (alternate) some levels replace other maps than the first one in the game and may require use of a warp command or special launch argument to get to it

Full game mods should be placed in Freedoom/config/mods

DISCLAIMER

This project is not affiliated with Id Software or parent companies, Bethesda, or any relevant publishing companies.

More info:
https://github.com/mkrupczak3/GZDoom-Android
https://freedoom.github.io/index.html
recentChanges: App now automatically creates folder Freedoom/config/mods to make it easier to install full game mods (IWADS)
Most individual level(s) (most WADS) should still be placed in Freedoom/config/wads
summary: A free and open source game on the GZDoom engine
title: Freedoom

comments: Was fun at first, then massive losing streak due to other players making every single shot perfect.  But most of the time when I start spending money I do better.  Odd.  I think I found a cheater during a putt.  He lined up correctly, however with the power he should have missed the hole.  I tried to watch the replay, but it is the only replay unavailable.  Then when we do the tie breaker shootout, he hits with pinpoint accuracy on the edge of the rough/fairway to get within 2 ft of the hole.

After playing for a while it just isn't that great.  It shows too much of what other people are doing and then makes you go first.  I've now tried for a few months but honestly it's designed to make you spend cash.  I still play a little but constantly think about uninstalling it.  It gives you a free golden tee shot maybe once a week.  The rewards are meh... Because you know if you won too much you wouldn't need to spend real cash.  For the amount of rewards you get it should play the free golden tee shot 3 times a week.  The best feature is that you can save a shot and upload to YouTube easily.

This game could use better and easier ways to earn money for opening the chests and scoring or pay outs after each prize or game. So you can get better equipment and achievements. Would help keep players more interested. My only dislikes so far. I most definitely enjoy the game and think it's pretty awesome!

Best game period. Not just golf or sports game, but any game. Wouldn't change a thing. All ya all who say, oh they need to change this or that, and why do I have to play someone who's better than me? Well it's because you suck, and you have no hand eye coordination. Just shut up and dribb, uh I mean play. #1 game for a reason peeps. Love ya. Dueces. Peace biatches.

First of all I love the game, I play every day. I especially love the tournaments. But now I have to congratulate you guys, you are brilliant. You took a push one button to go between guest and Facebook accounts, and changed it to pushing 20 buttons. And now you have to leave the game and go to the Facebook app to push most of them. Apparently you're not happy about two accounts. I don't know why, I spend twice as much money.  Tech monkeys, gotta love 'em.

I think most of the time i am actually playing against a computer and and not a real person . And the computer is programmed to make me lose so that i am forced  spend money on the game. The whole idea of gaming online is to have a friendly yet fair platfotn for people to enjoy and unwind.  So you based on the above very brief of the begining of the end fir companies such as yourselves... i would recommend the following simple advise free of charge.....  Safeguarding  the companies reputation is everything.  The future of gaming ,NOT INCLUDING casino/gambling type apps, will be based on trust and have a more family type target market, and thus should have different business models.

description: Lose yourself in the mysterious Elven Wonderland as you play solitaire across beautiful maps filled with magic, wonder and lots of interesting creatures! Explore the Elven Woods and beyond! The Elven Wonderland is full of amazing, mystical places. From the Elven Woods to the Frozen Lakes, you‚Äôll have over 75 levels of solitaire to enjoy as you embark on a quest across each land. Every month, the solitaire story is expanded with brand new exciting maps and levels ‚Äì so keep checking back for new updates!A classic card game with a magical twistBringing the fun of solitaire to your smartphone ‚Äì with a sprinkle of Elven magic ‚Äì you‚Äôll have hours of fun playing this relaxing single player card game. Just clear the piles of cards on the screen by selecting the card one value up or down from the card shown at the bottom of the screen. When you clear all the cards, you win!Daily tasks & lots of free bonuses!The Elven Wonderland is full of treasures and generous creatures who love to help you on your solitaire quest! Each day the wood elves will give you a list of tasks to earn extra coins, complete these tasks every day for huge rewards. Don‚Äôt want to complete tasks? You‚Äôve been given a magical bowl that fills up with coins slowly for you to empty every day! If that wasn‚Äôt enough, you can replay each level to earn even more coins! ============================Solitaire Quest ‚Äì Highlights============================‚Ä¢ A fun, relaxing single player card game‚Ä¢ Play solitaire across beautifully designed maps across Fairy Wonderland‚Ä¢ Over 75 levels with more added each month‚Ä¢ Unique elements in each level such as golden and locked cards‚Ä¢ Daily tasks ‚Äì complete them for huge free rewards‚Ä¢ Empty the coin globe each day for free coins‚Ä¢ Spend your coins to unlock new, unique card sets and styles‚Ä¢ Get useful power ups to help on your solitaire quest‚Ä¢ Play solitaire offline ‚Äì no internet connection neededYour quest across the Elven Wonderland‚Ä¶Elven Woods ‚Äì Levels 1-20Start your solitaire adventure in the elven woods. Full of fairies, wood elves and colourful mushrooms, you‚Äôre sure to meet some interesting characters to help you on your journey!Frozen Mountains ‚Äì Levels 21-40Meet reindeer, enchanted snowmen and more as you play solitaire on the frozen path through the mountains. Be careful ‚Äì it‚Äôs slippery!Wood Elf Village ‚Äì Levels 41-60The simple wood elves live in beautiful houses carved into giant mushrooms and huge oak trees. Play solitaire and meet the elves who live here ‚Äì maybe they‚Äôll let you stay the night before you continue on your journey!Red Road Pass ‚Äì Levels 61-80Once an active volcano, Red Road Pass is now a rough road of bright red stone. Discover rare gems as you walk along this challenging path playing solitaire with the mice who call it home.***More levels coming soon***==================================================================BE PART OF YOUR OWN SOLITAIRE STORY IN THE ELVEN WONDERLAND!==================================================================
descriptionHTML:
Lose yourself in the mysterious Elven Wonderland as you play solitaire across beautiful maps filled with magic, wonder and lots of interesting creatures!

Explore the Elven Woods and beyond!
The Elven Wonderland is full of amazing, mystical places. From the Elven Woods to the Frozen Lakes, you’ll have over 75 levels of solitaire to enjoy as you embark on a quest across each land. Every month, the solitaire story is expanded with brand new exciting maps and levels – so keep checking back for new updates!

A classic card game with a magical twist
Bringing the fun of solitaire to your smartphone – with a sprinkle of Elven magic – you’ll have hours of fun playing this relaxing single player card game. Just clear the piles of cards on the screen by selecting the card one value up or down from the card shown at the bottom of the screen. When you clear all the cards, you win!

Daily tasks & lots of free bonuses!
The Elven Wonderland is full of treasures and generous creatures who love to help you on your solitaire quest! Each day the wood elves will give you a list of tasks to earn extra coins, complete these tasks every day for huge rewards. Don’t want to complete tasks? You’ve been given a magical bowl that fills up with coins slowly for you to empty every day! If that wasn’t enough, you can replay each level to earn even more coins!

============================
Solitaire Quest – Highlights
============================
• A fun, relaxing single player card game
• Play solitaire across beautifully designed maps across Fairy Wonderland
• Over 75 levels with more added each month
• Unique elements in each level such as golden and locked cards
• Daily tasks – complete them for huge free rewards
• Empty the coin globe each day for free coins
• Spend your coins to unlock new, unique card sets and styles
• Get useful power ups to help on your solitaire quest
• Play solitaire offline – no internet connection needed

Your quest across the Elven Wonderland…

Elven Woods – Levels 1-20
Start your solitaire adventure in the elven woods. Full of fairies, wood elves and colourful mushrooms, you’re sure to meet some interesting characters to help you on your journey!

Frozen Mountains – Levels 21-40
Meet reindeer, enchanted snowmen and more as you play solitaire on the frozen path through the mountains. Be careful – it’s slippery!

Wood Elf Village – Levels 41-60
The simple wood elves live in beautiful houses carved into giant mushrooms and huge oak trees. Play solitaire and meet the elves who live here – maybe they’ll let you stay the night before you continue on your journey!

Red Road Pass – Levels 61-80
Once an active volcano, Red Road Pass is now a rough road of bright red stone. Discover rare gems as you walk along this challenging path playing solitaire with the mice who call it home.

***More levels coming soon***

==================================================================
BE PART OF YOUR OWN SOLITAIRE STORY IN THE ELVEN WONDERLAND!
==================================================================
developer: Beautiful Free Solitaire Games by Difference Games

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

description: Get ready to ride down the slopes and shred the fresh powder in #1 3D winter sports game on Android! descriptionHTML:
Get ready to ride down the slopes and shred the fresh powder in #1 3D winter sports game on Android! Carve, grind, jump, and grab big air with tricks and stunts!

Snowboard Master is a fast-paced 3D extreme sports simulation game, combining console quality graphics with the most realistic physics. Experience the sheer adrenaline rush of hurtling down a snow-packed ski ramp as if you were really there. Stomp your tricks in the backcountry and explore epic lines down insane mountainsides. Go big or go home!

Game Features:
- Realistic 3D graphics and incredibly immersive sound
- Dozens of riders and boards to unlock
- Intuitive controls - really feels like you are snowboarding!
developerAddress: 23 Lime Tree Bay Avenue, Grand Cayman KY1-1209, Cayman Islands
recentChanges: v1.2.1: Fixed some crash bugs of the game. Thanks.
summary: Snowboard Master is #1 3D winter extreme sports simulator game on Android.
title: Snowboard Master 3D

descriptionHTML:
Hello ARMY!

"Love, BTS!" is a role-playing game that allows you to talk and text with members of BTS! You can now talk to all BTS members just a tap away!

Talk to any of the members and they will talk with you back. Select among many different chat options to choose between various story lines. Call each member to hear them talk to you.

Features:
- Real-time message notifications
- Ability to call and receive calls from members
- Customizable ringtone
- Customizable themes
- Customizable options, including: dialog speed, personal name, bias selection
- BTS members can send personal pictures to you

Enjoy!
summary: BTS texting and call app for ARMYs! (English)
title: Love, BTS!

Roll up your sleeves, strap on your boots, and start matching, farmer!

FEATURES:

• Fun match-3 puzzle gameplay you already know and love
• Harvest crops to create and decorate your own ranch
• Over 250 fun and challenging match3 levels, and more to come!
• Explore a story filled with special exciting adventures
• Cute and quirky cast of characters and adorable animals
• Earn special gifts and daily rewards

Show off your decorating skills and restore your estate with a match-3 makeover puzzle game! Decorate your ranch with flowers, trees, bushes, build a treehouse, clear a pond and design the most beautiful ranch!

Solve casual puzzles, connect colorful fruits and vegetables, play Farm Slam and unlock new gardens, discover new characters and beautiful decoration.

Play Farm Slam - new innovative decor puzzle game, for free.

comments: It was fun while it lasted. I was a big fan of the first game and this one was an awesome improvement. Unfortunately my game crashed after months of playing and forced me to play the tutorial again. UPDATE: After reaching out to Pikpok customer service they reset my story progress and gifted me several leveled up weapons that help balance out what I lost. I appreciate their rapid response and look forward to playing more!

After i reach chapter 4, suddenly all my weapons progress are gone,  then i contact the support team,  and they dont restore my previous weapons,  but they give me MORE than what i have before. üòÑ  I really happy with this,  and i really appreciate this.  You guys should try this game. This is AWESOME. Now it's time for me to kill more zombies üòé

3 stars because although the game is fantastic in what it is, it needs optimization for slightly older devices such as my S7 Edge. I had to scale down to 720p screen res to be able to get a good enough framerate. And yes. I already tried playing on low graphics settings (in-game) before i changed my phone's resolution.

I give you guys a 5-star rating. The graphics are amazing. And the weapons are cool. The only thing. I wish we didn't have to have the stamina constraints. And it would be awesome if I was able to keep the extra ammo I find so I have it for future levels. And also its a pain in the ass to level up the guns all the damn time

OMG. I definitely LOVE this. Better than the first. The storyline had me excited. Now it's more fun running with a goal. Love everything. I'm on the lowest graphic settings but I still encounter minor lags. Oppo A83. But that's fine. I love how you can name your companion. Makes it more personal. Good job!

Excellent game. I am totally addicted to it. Developers can you please include a reload button. Also sometimes playing I hit a wall or fence and it becones impossible to move left or right. In that case moving a couple of steps backward coukd save us in the game. Please include these options for making the most out of it. Overall its an excellent game and I highlh recommend it.
description: The sequel to the hit zombie action game Into the Dead (70+ million downloads)!Journey through the zombie apocalypse in a race to save your family. Arm yourself with an arsenal of powerful weapons and do whatever it takes to survive. Maim, mow down, and massacre the Dead - anything to keep moving! In a world where no one is safe, how far will you go to make it out alive?FEATURES:‚Ä¢ Evolving story and multiple endings - complete 7 action-packed chapters, 60 stages, and hundreds of challenges‚Ä¢ Powerful weapons and ammo perks - unlock and upgrade melee weapons, firearms, explosives, and more!‚Ä¢ Varied gameplay - fire from military gun emplacements, slay the hordes from atop vehicles, stab them to stay alive, or risk going after them on foot‚Ä¢ Multiple, immersive environments - discover different locations, from oil fields and military bases to campsites and rural farm communities‚Ä¢ Ever-increasing zombie threats - adapt your tactics to annihilate different hordes, including armoured and running zombies!‚Ä¢ Daily and special event modes - prove your skills to win exclusive prizes‚Ä¢ Loyal canine companions - fend off zombies and stay protected in the fieldExternal storage permissions are required to ensure a smooth launch experience for all usersInto the Dead 2 is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.We love to hear from our players! On Twitter? Drop us a line @PikPokGames and join the conversation with #IntoTheDeadInto the Dead 2 requires the following permissions to access game expansion files:Storage: modify or delete the contents of your USB storageStorage: read the contents of your USB storage
descriptionHTML:
The sequel to the hit zombie action game Into the Dead (70+ million downloads)!

Journey through the zombie apocalypse in a race to save your family. Arm yourself with an arsenal of powerful weapons and do whatever it takes to survive. Maim, mow down, and massacre the Dead - anything to keep moving! In a world where no one is safe, how far will you go to make it out alive?

FEATURES:
• Evolving story and multiple endings - complete 7 action-packed chapters, 60 stages, and hundreds of challenges
• Powerful weapons and ammo perks - unlock and upgrade melee weapons, firearms, explosives, and more!
• Varied gameplay - fire from military gun emplacements, slay the hordes from atop vehicles, stab them to stay alive, or risk going after them on foot
• Multiple, immersive environments - discover different locations, from oil fields and military bases to campsites and rural farm communities
• Ever-increasing zombie threats - adapt your tactics to annihilate different hordes, including armoured and running zombies!
• Daily and special event modes - prove your skills to win exclusive prizes
• Loyal canine companions - fend off zombies and stay protected in the field

External storage permissions are required to ensure a smooth launch experience for all users

Into the Dead 2 is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

We love to hear from our players! On Twitter? Drop us a line @PikPokGames and join the conversation with #IntoTheDead

Into the Dead 2 requires the following permissions to access game expansion files:

Storage: modify or delete the contents of your USB storage
Storage: read the contents of your USB storage

recentChanges: - YEAR OF THE DOG! Play the next major event to earn the exclusive Golden Retriever companion!
- Dog Training! Collect treats to adopt and train your companions and improve their skills!
- Survival events now have companion point bonuses.
- Companions now unlock after stage 3. Collect and train them all!
- Fixed instances of excessive flashing on some screens due to user input.
- Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
summary: Kill zombies & run for survival - the ultimate zombie apocalypse action shooter!
title: Into the Dead 2: Zombie Shooter

Look at all the negative reviews and just move on.  Company responds to the reviews to make it look like they're addressing concerns but nothing is ever done.  It's beyond pay to win.  Those paying are blatantly cheating - numerous clear violations of the terms of service - and Lilith turns a blind eye.  Beyond incompetent.  They're actually corrupt.

A great game and extremely addictive once you really get into it. Well thought out. It can be very time consuming but that is what makes it great. The grind to level up Heroes makes me want to come back and carry on, unlock other heroes and further upgrade my Kingdom. My only issue is the fact that resources are hardly able to be kept. Being under constant attack from other groups and unable to allow my Kingdoms walls to regenerate properly before I am able to move again seems to be a recurring issue and one I do feel needs to be looked at and tweaked. Nonetheless, I'm impressed with the game. Continue with the good updates and this game could be one of the best mobile games out there.

The game was pretty nice, all the ones who are speaking different kind of language they can as well translate, but there is one problem. I can't edit the message for the clan, i wonder if it is a bug or not. Once i became lord of a clan because a former lord turn me into a lord then he said to me to edit the message of the box. I tried to edit then it cannot edit, pls. fix this problem

Great game.... but Chinese ruining it. The play to win is out of control and the Chinese have a pay advantage. They are ultra-nationalistic and team up against 'foreigners'. They need to have their own servers.

descriptionHTML:
Featured globally by Google Play!

◆ "This new strategy game gives you full control in a world full of dwarves, magic, and monsters. It’s the perfect marriage of MMO and strategy" - PocketGamer

◆ "Art of Conquest could very well be the mobile game fantasy and strategy fans have been waiting for " - App Spy

◆ "Players take full control of the battle. Art of Conquest is a breath of fresh air in the world of base-building strategy games"- 148Apps

◆ "The mobile RTS I never knew I wanted to play"- HaoGamers

◆ "A fascinating mix of many disparate genres all mixed into one title"- TouchArcade

◆ "A genre hybrid that blends RPG, RTS and MMO together to create something special" - DVS Gaming

◆"AoC reminds me of strategy games I played as a kid, but with much better gameplay and perfect for the mobile platform"- Kripparrian, Twitch & Youtube Content Creator


Explore a huge magical world!

Besiege enemy strongholds to expand your kingdom, slay nefarious dragons with a band of legendary heroes, and challenge players around the world to epic real-time battles!

FEATURES

● CHALLENGE your friends to thrilling real-time duels
● COMMAND hundreds of individual troops on a single - breathtaking field of battle
● SUMMON dozens of mythical heroes, each endowed with powerful abilities
● CHOOSE from five mighty races to raise your army
● BUILD your stronghold and besiege the enemy
● SIX embittered kingdoms strive to survive
● EXPLORE the beautiful, hand-crafted world of Nore
● DEFEAT evil bosses and loot unfathomable rewards

Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/artofconquest
Twitter：https://twitter.com/Art_of_conquest
Official Website：http://artofconquest.com

descriptionHTML:
++---Thank you 100 thousand download!---++

This is the dress up game which freely customizes the character "Tiyoko" drawn by illustrator "Yuri Takahashi".

When your favorite combination is decided, take the pictures and make it a smartphone wallpaper or upload it to SNS!

It is OK to use the image you created for SNS icon etc. We would be very happy if you can use a variety of images to tell your friends about our application! !

- Characteristics
・Choosing from a large selection of parts and dress up to your liking!

・The vector illustrations that is never blurred no matter how big it is!

・The layout function with high degree of freedom that can be changed to position, size, pose!

・You can paste some stamps and apply effects, let's make it more!

* Some effects may not work depending on the terminal.

comments: Love all the delicious Emily games, however I don't like how you have to connect to Facebook to earn a trophy, and some of the game controls didn't work correctly all the time. The swipe motion didn't seem to work very well on a lot of levels making me replay the same level multiple times because swipe wouldn't work and would mess up the whole level. I almost deleted it because of this but I'm glad I stuck with it.

i just started to play the game and was really enjoying it. Nice story line and fun to play. Then it got to the point at level 2 where the crib section was and the ads stop loading try again later. I keep trying to go back after waiting to play and it still gives me the same response. $10 to pay for a game is extremely expensive, I have never seen a game on google play for that amount of money. Most are free or free trial but not at the rate you guys charge. Seriously? you guys need to be more reasonable because the majority of your players are kids. So a word to the developer. If you want to attract and keep your content enjoyable for all ages, make it affordable to all young and old. Im just saying. I myself enjoyed the game overall, but I honestly will not pay that amount to play the game when there are so many other games to play that are free for all.

Great game, love the back story and the different levels. Only issue was on level 51 the story telling part/intro didn't work, there was no dialogue, all I could do was press skip. I tried updating the app and clear the cache and it still didn't work.

I love this game! Storylines amazing, graphics amazing, levels amazing, music amazing... the only problems I had with the game were a couple glitches with the advertisements, and level and i had to skip level 51 because of some weird glitch,  but otherwise the game was the best!

I think it is hard for few people to purchase it. I personally love thus game but cannot purchase it. I hope and request game house to remove those purchase things will be removed so that I can play easily and so as other people.

One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? üë∂ üçºüçº WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's lifeüçº PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levelsüçº GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first handüçº DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related placesüçº HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, Fran√ßois and Allison, plus many othersüçº CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby roomüçº TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every dayüçº CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved onesWill you be there for Emily when she needs you most?Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. üé• üçù It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... descriptionHTML:
Join Emily for a very special chapter of her life! One thing's for sure, her family will never be the same again after this...

Right after Emily starts her very own cooking video blog, she receives some heart-warming news... She's expecting a new bundle of joy! But how's Emily going to combine everything that's going on in her life with getting ready for the baby? 👶 🍼

🍼 WELCOME THE NEW DELICIOUS FAMILY MEMBER and be a part of this heart-felt stage in Emily's life
🍼 PLAY 60 TOUCHING TIME MANAGEMENT LEVELS and 30 extra challenging bonus levels
🍼 GUIDE EMILY THROUGH HER PREGNANCY and witness her many ups and downs first hand
🍼 DISCOVER 6 DIFFERENT LOCATIONS and visit Emily's Kitchen, a Yoga Studio, a Day Care Center and other super cute baby-related places
🍼 HANG OUT WITH EMILY'S FRIENDS AND FAMILY and say hi to Angela, François and Allison, plus many others
🍼 CUSTOMIZE THE NEW NURSERY and surprise Emily with the perfect baby room
🍼 TRY NEW FEATURES LIKE DAILY CHALLENGES and take on a new challenge level every day
🍼 CREATE YOUR OWN DELICIOUS POSTCARDSand earn all the trophies to share special messages with your loved ones

Will you be there for Emily when she needs you most?

Having your very own cooking video blog and sharing delicious family recipes with the rest of the world doesn't come easy. 🎥 🍝 It's hard work - and with a family like Emily's, you never know what might happen...

On top of everything, Emily's really tired and hasn't been feeling well lately. She and Patrick have been trying to have another baby, but without any success. Is it simply not in the cards for them? Yet just as they try to accept this, Emily receives some life-changing news... She's not feeling well, because she's pregnant! 👶

Emily and Patrick couldn't be happier! But how are they going to manage everything that's going on? Preparing for the baby, filming the cooking vlog, handling their over-excited family... They could use a hand!

Help Emily through this emotional rollercoaster and get ready to experience the miracles of life! ❤

Try the first few levels for free! The full complement of levels can be unlocked with an in-app purchase.

Follow Emily on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeliciousGames/

Enjoy more GameHouse Original Stories, and try our other games:

comments: Graphics are crystal clear, game play is easy to understand, assists in majority of the steps needed to build and upgrade your city buildings and troops and a dragon. Play in tournaments, and get rewards to assist in your upgrading. What's not to love,  course I'd like to see this game run without an internet connection so I could play offline too...thanks.

The game is supposed to be for battling your enemy but you spend countless hours sorting through the packs which are random at best in content offering very little for the price paid. They encourage you to register the game with an email account but give you the run around should you seek to change it. The game is not worth the time nor money.

comments: I love that you don't lose troops while defending. The only problem is the cost to heal them is rediculous. There are many aggressive players that assault you early on in the game and unless you pay money it becomes difficult to maintain a stable civilization. I believe it would be better if there were cheaper or easier ways to gain resources for those whom don't pay to win. Thank you for the amazing game though! Love you guys and I will never quit playing!

I watched commercials about this on YouTube and after downloading the game I was very disappointed about the graphics. It's more like a crudely drawn cartoon. It seems OK, but there's not a whole lot of variations from other games in this category. Wish the developers of these games would add a new feature or two just to make it stand out. I'm going to keep playing but if it doesn't get better after a while I'll probably unistall.

The admins take too long to respond. Do not waste any money in this game. They took my account away when I switched phones and its been over a week. Meanwhile, all my troops got destroyed and my game is ruined. And I've spent over $60 real money. You would think they'd take care of a money spender but no. They just ghosted me.

The support for this game is a joke.  I have been playing for 3 months and they have yet to correct a single thing.  I still can't bind to my Facebook and their resolution was to start over even though I have spent well over 100 bucks on this app.  Very disappointing.

I like the game. Has a few things that are a pain though. Like you cant share resources if they were bought, what does that even matter. I also dont like that your avatar can only be your facebook pic or an in game one..give me the option to upload my own pic without changing my facebook one.

Very unbalanced.  Dominated by purple, orange, and blue hordes. If you start as any other horde color you will be raided constantly with no support. Be prepared to spend lots of money on peace shields...

comments: Is it just me or does this happen to everyone? When I use a power up like 2X or instant bingo, does it land on the same number? I had an "instant bingo" land on B9 on three different cards (B9 was never called)! Same with most power ups! Just curious!!!

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

Okay, I play these games when I wake up and this one costs a fortune to play!!! Then, I have found with the challenges it doesnt give you credit as it should for utilizing the power ups you bought. I just used two for a challenge, and it never registered. If youre willing to dump money this is the ideal game  Oh and you cant reach support through the app to discuss these mistakes so....youre SOL when the game messes up. After spending oodles on this game, time to delete.

comments: My partner is awesome and it doesn't out Trump you or play like a suicide bomber either. Tried the rest but this is the best for free guys. Awesome job. Asthetics is good and simple. Be great if you could put a 'speed slider' dial to slow gameplay down, so as my young master can play whilst learning. Superb guys n gals. This one is definitely worth trying. Beats Zelda's 'free game' she, wants to Trump you out most times.

Love this game! I've read lots of reviews and they kind of surprised me. This game seems to me to pretty accurately reflect Euchre when we play at home. Good hands, bad hands, balances out pretty evenly in the end. We don't use the "Going Under" feature, but it would sure be a help if you are stuck with at least 3 9s&10s to be able to switch with the pile!‚úî The gold circle with the D in it indicates the dealer. The Trump suit is put beside the player who called Trump. Fast, easy, fun!

Bots call Trump when they can't even take 2 tricks, so I'm constantly getting set or setting the other team. It's nice for practice to get use to thinking out probabilities, but that all goes out the window when a bot leads out with the 10 of trump on the first play. Bot logic needs a lot of help to make it realistic.

This game was and is great. I am not a big fan of the constant 5 second ads now though. I understand it is a free app that needs to be supported by ads but it is after every round now  I and I am losing interest because it takes too long to  I play now. I hope you get it sorted out though. Whenever my right calls Bauer and I lead with an offsuit Ace,they NEVER ever have that suit. If I am making it,that same Opponent to my right ALWAYS has an offsuit ace as the stopper . Becoming too predictable in that way. Also,I have never played euchre in real life where you order up your partner and they play too.

Nice Very cool.  Am using it to teach my teenage children the game :)  on the downside - it's not often I'm dealt a decent hand.  N sometimes my partner stuffs up big time (like what were they thinking) :) but then again so do I lol.

The A-I makes it impossible to win unless you play on easy mode. Table talk is an understatement...the cpu gets at least 5 viable loaner hands every game on medium or above and the partners always have just the right cards available. Not random at all and no skill required. Let the players play and don't load the cpu's hand every hand. Ugh
description: Euchre is a classic trick taking card game, similar to Hearts and Spades. It's widely played in the United States, where it's also known as Bacon, and in other English speaking countries. In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game you play with 3 other players, forming 2 teams, and the deck in play consists of the 9, 10, J, Q, K and A cards. There is always a trump and your objective is to score 10 or more points. You get these points in matches with 5 tricks, where the team that scores the most points and tricks wins.In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game, you play just like in real life, choosing between accepting the trump, passing or changing your cards, playing the match with your partner or going alone. Play the best cards and use the trumps wisely to win the tricks.Features:- 3 difficulty levels: choose between easy, medium and hard.- Customize the cards from the deck and the table.- Autosave: restart the game from where you stopped.- Statistics with your performance in the game.- 100% free game, with unlimited matches.If you like card games like Hearts, Spades, 500 and other trick taking card games, you will love Euchre!Download Euchre Free: Classic Card Game now and get ready for hours of fun with this classic card game. And don‚Äôt get euchred!
descriptionHTML:
Euchre is a classic trick taking card game, similar to Hearts and Spades. It's widely played in the United States, where it's also known as Bacon, and in other English speaking countries. In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game you play with 3 other players, forming 2 teams, and the deck in play consists of the 9, 10, J, Q, K and A cards. There is always a trump and your objective is to score 10 or more points. You get these points in matches with 5 tricks, where the team that scores the most points and tricks wins.

In Euchre Free: Classic Card Game, you play just like in real life, choosing between accepting the trump, passing or changing your cards, playing the match with your partner or going alone. Play the best cards and use the trumps wisely to win the tricks.

Features:

- 3 difficulty levels: choose between easy, medium and hard.
- Customize the cards from the deck and the table.
- Autosave: restart the game from where you stopped.
- Statistics with your performance in the game.
- 100% free game, with unlimited matches.

If you like card games like Hearts, Spades, 500 and other trick taking card games, you will love Euchre!

Download Euchre Free: Classic Card Game now and get ready for hours of fun with this classic card game. And don’t get euchred!

descriptionHTML:
The Truth Is Out There – do you have what it takes to find it?

Delve into the unknown, investigate mysterious cases of the paranormal and unravel an international conspiracy in a thrilling, story-driven hidden object X-Files adventure game.


Welcome to The X-Files, Special Agent. The following intel is classified Top Secret / For Your Eyes Only. You and Agent Dale have been selected to investigate mysterious crime scenes that defy explanation.


• Embark on an odyssey through the X-Files universe

• Uncover clues, collect and process evidence, solve puzzles and help interrogate suspects

• Let your clever eye and cunning mind serve you to reach the top of the leaderboard

• Reveal the truth by discovering objects while investigating new cases every month

• Team up with other FBI Agents to solve challenging and perplexing X-Files cases

• Choose your own moral decisions, customize your appearance and unlock achievements


Meet Fellow Agents
Connect with other Special Agents, search for clues and make new friends:
• Website: http://xfilesgame.com
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/xfilesgame
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/xfilesgame/
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/xfilesgame
• Tumblr: https://proj-x-art.tumblr.com/
• Pintrest: https://www.pinterest.com/xfilesgame/


TROUBLESHOOTING
- If the game doesn’t start, runs slowly or crashes, please get in touch and we’ll provide assistance.

- If you have questions, please use one of two options to contact us through our Support System https://support.creative-mobile.com/Tickets/Submit or via e-mail at support@creative-mobile.com


Privacy Policy: http://creative-mobile.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: http://creative-mobile.com/terms-of-use/

© 2017 Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation. All rights reserved.
recentChanges: The Bureau is hard at work improving your work experience!
- More alien bugs were found and killed. We think we're on the trail of the Alien Bug Queen now. Uh... wish us luck.
summary: The X-Files conspiracy comes to life in a thrilling hidden object adventure
title: The X-Files: Deep State

description: Its a physics puzzle game.You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon.Your goal is to use this physics line or polygon to push the ball to the same color cup.When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!Its a nice brain-training game.Hope you can learn physics from the game.Have fun.More levels is coming!
descriptionHTML:
Its a physics puzzle game.You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon.
Your goal is to use this physics line or polygon to push the ball to the same color cup.
When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!
Its a nice brain-training game.Hope you can learn physics from the game.
Have fun.More levels is coming!
summary: Draw the physics based line to push the blue or red ball to the same color cup.
title: Draw Physics Line

description: Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. You can pick matching outfits or completely different clothes for each girl. Even though the bride is the most important person at the wedding, the bridesmaids will also need to shine. Do your best as a wedding stylist!Classy Wedding Salon game features:üíê a gorgeous bride and 3 bridesmaidsüíê makeup, hair and dress up game levelsüíê wedding themed makeup, hairstyles and clothing items (dresses, blouses, skirts and lots of accessories)üíê girly graphics and intuitive gameplayüíê free to play wedding gameüíê fun and safe for little girlsüíê no wifi gameThe wedding will start soon and these lovely girls need you! Join them right away in one of the most amazing wedding games. Do the bride's makeup, style her hair and find the perfect wedding dress. Then, explore different fashion options with the 3 bridesmaids. You will never get bored of this game for girls, give it a chance and let the fun begin!

descriptionHTML:
Zgirls II is a 3D massively multiplayer online zombie survival game available to players all over the world. In this game, you play as a bionic girl thrown into a hellish world filled with zombies, with only one goal: SURVIVE!

Rules for Survival：
Collect as many resources as possible
Resources are essential for survival. Within the game, you will have to search for all kinds of resources to build a home to shelter yourself from zombie attacks.
Obtain Food
Hunt, forage, or search for supplies. You can’t fight on an empty stomach. After each battle, replenish yourself by cooking some food on the bonfire.
Slaughter Zombies
The greatest threat to your survival is zombies. Effectively defending yourself against them is the key to your survival. Make sure to use the weapons at your disposal correctly as making too much sound can attract herds of zombies and bring horrendous consequences.
Unlock New Gadgets
You are only able to create primitive makeshift weapons during early stages of the game, but as you level up, you will be able to unlock better weapons and working platforms to boost your combat ability and make survival easier. With abundant resources, you can even create your own Battle Mech.
Player vs. Player Combat
If you want faster access to resources, a predatory approach is your best option. Gather your trustworthy friends for epic battles for control of resources. Prepare well and don’t let your teammates down!
Join Gangs
Individual power has its limits. Being in a gang will boost your chances of survival. Having allies is great, even if they’re only temporary. Work together with other gang members for mutual benefit or stab them in the back and take all their loot.

After an unprecedented long global war in 2058, humanity has started to rebuild. Behind closed doors, and with unspeakable intentions, Paradise Group has started a project that will change the future for all of humanity – the Human Aid Project.
All test subjects are sent to a mysterious and creepy island, pitted against innumerable immortal monsters, and left completely unarmed! That’s only the beginning of a grand slaughter, of which the end nobody knows. In this world, the only truth is that of SURVIVAL. The horror does not stop at zombies as you will also be challenged by hunger, cold, exhaustion and even attacks from other players. Sometimes even nature itself is your enemy! There are only temporary allies here, because only the last survivor will be granted Rebirth and Freedom.
Welcome to this crazy world of slaughter! Do whatever it takes to be the last one standing!


【Contact】
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/Zgirls-II-Last-One-123777631654196/
developerAddress: Unit 806, 8/F, Tower II, Cheung Sha Wan Plaza, 833 Cheung Sha Wan Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong

summary: Welcome to this crazy world of slaughter! Be the last one standing!
title: Zgirls II-Last One

My review before the ads:  I love playing this spider solitaire. I have to give it 5 stars because that jazz music in the background is infectious and complements this game so well. My only real complaint is that I want to increase the volume so I can hear it much better. I'll leave the game on sometimes just to hear that subtle soft groovy tune with my volume as high a I can. Anyway good game.

Enjoy the game but Not so the many ads.  Additionally,  my security system is constantly finding junk on this app and my phone gets very hot if I play for a while.  It also takes alot of the battery.  Overall, I do enjoy.

Does what it says on the tin! Perfect for a simple game to pass the time and relaxes me. For those complaining about the adverts being inappropriate, adverts are based on recent searches. I only receive adverts on the university I'm looking at. 9 times out of ten if you've searches something similar before you'll get a similar advert. Fyi

a lot of fun but the ads are annoying but i guess it comes with a free game. bottom bar is very sensitive and always pops up whether u want to use it or not. overal I'm enjoying it and i play it everyday. great stess reliever.
I just disable ads during play, sure you can do the same. Stop complaining. The game is for free! Keeps my mind active and easy to play

I quite enjoy this game and understand that advertisements are part of the package however i am sick of seeing ads depicting products of a sexual nature. These images are inappropriate on a game children can play. It's also annoying how the card stacks automatically bunch up randomly so you can't see the cards behind without tapping the stack to unbunch them

description: Raft: The Last Maverick ‚Äì an original story-driven free survival game brought to you by Pride Games Studio, the well-proven survival genre masters. A new action adventure from the creators of Survival Island: Evolved will take you on a ride to the deep ocean waters set in a beautiful steampunk open world. You find yourself as a lone survivor on a raft amidst the endless waters of the Pacific, having to survive bloodthirsty sharks and underwater predators along with hunger, thirst and exhaustion. Explore tropical islands and hidden dungeons, gather resources, craft weapons and armor, upgrade your raft and evolve your hero ‚Äì fight for your survival! Raft: The Last Maverick brings the survival simulator games to the new level of realism, engagement and fun.Craft! Evolve! Survive! * Survival of the fittest! Do your best to survive ‚Äì design and upgrade a unique raft and turn it into real shelter. Explore the ocean for useful materials, craft new armor and weapons to fight off primal predators, hunt for food and learn to produce fresh water. Dive into action ‚Äì everything you do will increase the chances of your survival.* Pimp your Raft! Start with just a small patch of wood that barely keeps your survivor afloat and build, build, build! First set up beds and chairs, then create furnace, workbench, water purifier and tons more of useful constructions. Evolve your building skills well enough and your hero will craft almost anything, even a real ballista to protect your shelter! An impenetrable steampunk fortress or a glamorous hotel with an ocean view ‚Äì Craft your Raft until it makes you Daft! * The Lord of the Skills! As your hero ventures further into the ocean, you‚Äôll witness him grow, develop and become stronger with each action taken and new level achieved. Let your survivor evolve from a green sailor-boy to the real Pacific Terror! * Blazing Guns of Captain Hook! The endless ocean not only offers stunning views but also holds many dangers. To keep enemies at bay Raft: The Last Maverick gives you a vast arsenal of guns, melee weapons and other means to defend your floating shelter. If you run out of anything, the trusty hook will always come in handy to reach far off crafting and building materials without the need to roleplay as a shark bait! * Raft Fiction! Follow the enticing story of The Last Maverick. Complete quests, look for other survivors, face brutal betrayals and bizarre plot-twists, form strong bonds with unlikely allies and craft your own destiny. Put all your strength to achieve the final goal ‚Äì reaching the New World. If you play your cards right and manage to survive long enough you‚Äôll be the one to uncover the mystery behind the unfortunate shipwreck. What at first seemed as just a coincidence might turn out into the meanest deception the steampunk world has seen! * Three men in a Raft! Multiplayer mode coming soon! Once you feel confident in your skills and evolve past the beginners point, you‚Äôll be ready to join forces with your friends online to add even more brutal action to your adventure. Team up with other players online in the multiplayer mode, decide if you wish to save them from starvation or rob them of their last means for survival. Multiplayer will bring a new thrill even to the most weathered Heroes of the ocean!Join us: https://www.facebook.com/thelastmaverickgame
descriptionHTML:
Raft: The Last Maverick – an original story-driven free survival game brought to you by Pride Games Studio, the well-proven survival genre masters. A new action adventure from the creators of Survival Island: Evolved will take you on a ride to the deep ocean waters set in a beautiful steampunk open world. You find yourself as a lone survivor on a raft amidst the endless waters of the Pacific, having to survive bloodthirsty sharks and underwater predators along with hunger, thirst and exhaustion. Explore tropical islands and hidden dungeons, gather resources, craft weapons and armor, upgrade your raft and evolve your hero – fight for your survival! Raft: The Last Maverick brings the survival simulator games to the new level of realism, engagement and fun.
Craft! Evolve! Survive!

* Survival of the fittest! Do your best to survive – design and upgrade a unique raft and turn it into real shelter. Explore the ocean for useful materials, craft new armor and weapons to fight off primal predators, hunt for food and learn to produce fresh water. Dive into action – everything you do will increase the chances of your survival.

* Pimp your Raft! Start with just a small patch of wood that barely keeps your survivor afloat and build, build, build! First set up beds and chairs, then create furnace, workbench, water purifier and tons more of useful constructions. Evolve your building skills well enough and your hero will craft almost anything, even a real ballista to protect your shelter! An impenetrable steampunk fortress or a glamorous hotel with an ocean view – Craft your Raft until it makes you Daft!

* The Lord of the Skills! As your hero ventures further into the ocean, you’ll witness him grow, develop and become stronger with each action taken and new level achieved. Let your survivor evolve from a green sailor-boy to the real Pacific Terror!

* Blazing Guns of Captain Hook! The endless ocean not only offers stunning views but also holds many dangers. To keep enemies at bay Raft: The Last Maverick gives you a vast arsenal of guns, melee weapons and other means to defend your floating shelter. If you run out of anything, the trusty hook will always come in handy to reach far off crafting and building materials without the need to roleplay as a shark bait!

* Raft Fiction! Follow the enticing story of The Last Maverick. Complete quests, look for other survivors, face brutal betrayals and bizarre plot-twists, form strong bonds with unlikely allies and craft your own destiny. Put all your strength to achieve the final goal – reaching the New World. If you play your cards right and manage to survive long enough you’ll be the one to uncover the mystery behind the unfortunate shipwreck. What at first seemed as just a coincidence might turn out into the meanest deception the steampunk world has seen!

* Three men in a Raft! Multiplayer mode coming soon! Once you feel confident in your skills and evolve past the beginners point, you’ll be ready to join forces with your friends online to add even more brutal action to your adventure. Team up with other players online in the multiplayer mode, decide if you wish to save them from starvation or rob them of their last means for survival. Multiplayer will bring a new thrill even to the most weathered Heroes of the ocean!

Join us:
https://www.facebook.com/thelastmaverickgame

descriptionHTML:
Build, upgrade and defend your very own medieval castle! Use strategy and command your army of holy knights to attack your enemies (or friends) and battle your way to glory in this new game - PaladinZ: Champions of Might!

PaladinZ is simple and easy to play, this game is a combination of strategy, magic, knights, and some funny jokes. It requires you plan how to protect your castle (don’t just build and upgrade everything you can in a random order) and plan your attacks carefully (just sending every knight you have won’t cut it) in order to win every battle and make your Lord - THE Lord of the Land.


Game Features:
✔ Build and upgrade your very own medieval castle
✔ Place your defences strategically and defend against other players’ attacks
✔ Watch out and protect your lands from the Poachers
✔ Train your army of funny characters - Spearmen, Archers, Witches, Griffons and more
✔ Upgrade and evolve your army into an unbeatable force
✔ Battle players worldwide and take their Gold, Food and Trophies
✔ Challenge your friends to see who has the best army and who is the better Lord
✔ Discover your favorite attack and defence forces from countless combinations of units
✔ Watch replays of every battle - Watch your holy army in battle to improve your strategy
✔ See how you compare to other players worldwide in Google Achievements and Ranking
✔ Knights & castles themed graphics and sounds with adorable, funny characters
✔ Free action charged strategy game - You have to have strategy in your attacks!
✔ Play as either a male or a female and command your army of holy knights to victory!


Join the PaladinZ Community and get updates, participate in competitions or just watch some funny videos of our holy knights:

Like us: https://www.facebook.com/PaladinZGame/


Terms of Service: http://www.spartonix.com/#/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.spartonix.com/#/privacy

title: PaladinZ: Champions of Might

description: Best ancient history adventure! Travel in time to the age of pharaohs, when monument building and pyramid exploration were normal! Enjoy creative crafting & building of a desert city, visit the Sphynx, explore the mummy tombs! The whole ancient world waits to be explored!Get right into the exploration of an ancient city of the pyramids! Have a walk in the desert, watch a beautiful sunset! Visit the sphynx statue, go on an adventure around the pyramids, see the best parts of Egypt! Stroll on the banks of the great river Nile.Become a pharaoh and rule your desert kingdom! Walk among your subjects like a god, destroy buildings as you please, build any kind of monuments you want! This is your world and pyramid building is only one of the possible ways of spending your time. Use the creative mode to unleash the power of your imagination to better the world (or to crush it!). Create, destroy, enjoy!Best free crafting game of 2018! Use blueprints to build ancient monuments that will inspire awe. Simply place one and start filling it with blocks to recreate the most famous ancient egyptian structures that you'll certainly remember from history books. This free building game will also let you use your own imagination to create anything you want. Would you like to see a medieval castle in the middle of the desert? Go for it! Do you want to build your own house? Let's do it! Mine and craft materials from sands and stones.Crafting & building a city will allow you to feel like you've actually traveled in time to the age of ancient Egypt. The hot deserts, sandy buildings and people dressed in robes are all presented using unique blocky graphics that may remind you of other adventure games with building and exploration. All of this is your sandbox where you are free to do as you please. Crafting & building will become your second nature.Look no further - one of the top ancient history city building games is here! Download now and become a pharaoh!

Customize a horse!
You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. A horse herd life is fascinating, experience it in our animal simulator!

Take care of a herd!
Once your horse strong enough, you can star a herd and explore the world together - horse is a herding animal! Groom your foals, level up your horse herd to make a bigger herd in the animal simulator. And don’t forget to wash, feed and play with your horse!

Explore open world!
There’s a lot to do in the animals life simulator, so explore the world with your herd! Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!

Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!

description: Description - Super Crash Adventure - WrappedCrash has come a long way, from mascot hopeful to the hardcore platform fan's hero. His latest game may be largely more of the same that much is true.Gameplay - Super Crash Adventure - WrappedWarped is a drop-dead gorgeous game. The textures are impeccable, the animation's top-notch, and the special effects kick some serious booty. It sounds great too (thank heavens for more musical diversity, although I had nothing against Mark Mothersbaugh's score for part two). Play-wise it's the best action-platformer I've played since, well, the last Crash.On the issue of difficulty, Warped does come up one the easy side. It can be beaten by most experienced players in an afternoon. But it'll take days of play to truly complete the game, finding all of the items, and out-doing each stage's best time. Simple as it may seem, the time trial mode really does a lot to increase the game's longevity.So what if the game may not offer the most innovation I've ever seen from a sequel? It still brings enough freshness (in the form of its semi free-roaming portions and new play mechanics) and refinement to the table to suit my tastes just fine. Not only that, it's an incredibly fun game.Feature - Super Crash Adventure - WrappedWarped is very much like Crash Adventure previous two efforts at its core. Crash still runs, jumps, and spins his way though vertically and horizontally-scrolling 3D environments, classic platforming game style. But it also has its share of improvements. Among these are a wider variety of locales (eight in all, from ancient Egypt to the future), a second playable character, and the closest thing to free-roaming environments we're likely to see in a Crash title; a biplane dogfight and Jetski-style ocean outing are just two. All-in-all, there are more than 35 stages.There's also a time trial mode where you can compete against your buddies to see who can get through levels faster, plus unlock a secret warp room is you beat the top time in each. Crash Adventure has also taken strides to ensure that Dual Shock feedback and analog control are both supported in this sequel. You've no doubt played one of Crash's first two adventures, but how does his third stack up? Here's the verdict straight from our resident experts.
descriptionHTML:
Description - Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped
Crash has come a long way, from mascot hopeful to the hardcore platform fan's hero. His latest game may be largely more of the same that much is true.

Gameplay - Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped

Warped is a drop-dead gorgeous game. The textures are impeccable, the animation's top-notch, and the special effects kick some serious booty. It sounds great too (thank heavens for more musical diversity, although I had nothing against Mark Mothersbaugh's score for part two). Play-wise it's the best action-platformer I've played since, well, the last Crash.

On the issue of difficulty, Warped does come up one the easy side. It can be beaten by most experienced players in an afternoon. But it'll take days of play to truly complete the game, finding all of the items, and out-doing each stage's best time. Simple as it may seem, the time trial mode really does a lot to increase the game's longevity.

So what if the game may not offer the most innovation I've ever seen from a sequel? It still brings enough freshness (in the form of its semi free-roaming portions and new play mechanics) and refinement to the table to suit my tastes just fine. Not only that, it's an incredibly fun game.

Feature - Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped

Warped is very much like Crash Adventure previous two efforts at its core. Crash still runs, jumps, and spins his way though vertically and horizontally-scrolling 3D environments, classic platforming game style. But it also has its share of improvements. Among these are a wider variety of locales (eight in all, from ancient Egypt to the future), a second playable character, and the closest thing to free-roaming environments we're likely to see in a Crash title; a biplane dogfight and Jetski-style ocean outing are just two. All-in-all, there are more than 35 stages.

There's also a time trial mode where you can compete against your buddies to see who can get through levels faster, plus unlock a secret warp room is you beat the top time in each. Crash Adventure has also taken strides to ensure that Dual Shock feedback and analog control are both supported in this sequel. You've no doubt played one of Crash's first two adventures, but how does his third stack up? Here's the verdict straight from our resident experts.
summary: Crash has come a long way, from mascot hopeful to the hardcore platform fan's
title: Super Crash Adventure - Wrapped

descriptionHTML:
In Spin-Tops you will be spinning with your battle Spin-Top around stadiums and try to knock your opponents down before your top stops.

Spin Tops presented two modes Arcade mode and Tournament mode presented with different diffuculty levels and stadiums.
Realistic physics simulation will ensure that matches will be more exciting and not always the same

Powers Ups are spawned randomly to make the game more entertaining

Download Spin-Tops now for free!
summary: This game is a Spin Top Battle
title: Spin Top Blade Battle
